title: The Dystopia Spell
description: Jed Ryland is an agent of the Crossroads, always on watch for incompatible universes smashing together. This time out, a dystopian society where teens are forced to battle for their lives is invaded by monsters from a sword-and-sorcery fantasy realm.  Jed’s mission: keep the teens alive, repel the invasion, topple the oppressive government, locate the artifact pulling the worlds together, and prevent the utter destruction of both universes.  Piece of cake.  The Dystopia Spell is the first book in Brian Olsen’s Multiverse Mashup. Book two, Night of the Living Date is also available, so buy The Dystopia Spell now to get started on this series of fast-paced genre-smashing adventures!  Are your swashbuckling pirates battling killer robots? Is a masked slasher lurking in your cozy mystery? Does your space opera have too little space and too much opera?  When genres collide, Jed is there to pick up the pieces…and have a whole lot of fun in the process.
author: Brian Olsen
